StoryText: I have loads of homework and my mother asks me to go to the grocery store with her to help her shop.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Tell her I have homework and stay home to do my homework.
Tell her I have homework but go hang out with my friend %FirstName:NPC:2%
Tell her I want to hang out with my friend %FirstName:NPC:2%

OptionResult.Result: We go to the store and have a good time talking and shopping and I also find $50 in the parking lot!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My mother and I had a great time at the store together, talking and sharing stories, I even found $50! But I completely forgot about my homework and my grades were affected.

OptionResult.Result: My mother understands and I stay home and finish my homework. However, I forget to eat and faint.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My mother was happy I was being responsible and I managed to finish all of my homework and learned a ton! Forgot to eat though, fainted in the bathroom and hit my head!

OptionResult.Result: I play video games with %FirstName:NPC:2% at his place and when my mother comes home and Iâ€™m not there, she grounds me.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FirstName:NPC:2% and I had a blast doing nothing but playing video games. Might be the last time I get out of the house in awhile since my mother grounded me for lying.

OptionResult.Result: My mother tells me if I stay home I have to do my homework. I stay home and do most of my homework but spend a lot of time eating snacks and watching TV.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My mother was mad and made me stay home and do homework. I did most of it but decided I needed to unwind with snacks and TV too. Not that I told her that, but it turned out pretty great!
